events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this is very disappointing.
The system has categorized this case under Refund due to the customer's request involving a return and refund for the wrong item sent.
The case has been assigned to agent Linda M. who specializes in processing refund requests for incorrect shipments.
Hello! I’m Linda, and I’ll be helping you today with your request for a refund regarding the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the mistake and process your refund?
Here is my order number: 8456231, and I have attached a photo showing that the item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid return label for you to send the incorrect item back.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid return shipping offer and the refund timeline you provided.
Your refund request has been processed. You will receive your money back within 5 business days and a return shipping label has been emailed to you.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and the return label, and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I got the refund today and the return label worked perfectly. Thank you very much for your help resolving this issue quickly.
We are glad your refund was successful and the issue is resolved. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
